thread.title: This Website Turns Your Doodles Into Real Cats, And You Into A Scaredy-Cat
thread.title_full: This Website Turns Your Doodles Into Real Cats, And You Into A Scaredy-Cat

title: This Website Turns Your Doodles Into Real Cats, And You Into A Scaredy-Cat
text: This Website Turns Your Doodles Into Real Cats, And You Into A Scaredy-Cat By Mikelle Leow , 23 Feb 2017 Subscribe to newsletter Like us on Facebook A website that brings cat doodles to life will make you wish cats didn’t have nine lives. Co-founder of Pushbullet Christopher Hesse has created a set of interactive image-to-image translation tools that work on building, cat, shoe and handbag sketches. Using 2,000 cat stock photos, the cat translation tool is the kind of cloning technology everyone has been afraid of but never knew they wanted. Instantly transforming scratchy drawings into furry monsters, you’ll wonder if you’re looking at cats from a mouse’s point of view.
